name: Altus
description: Altus is a desktop client for WhatsApp with multiple account support and themes.

name: Music & Stuff
description: “Music & Stuff” is the blog that I write. It is based on the Hexo SSG, and the theme is written by me using EJS and SASS.

name: Operate
description: Operate is a primitive re-creation of an operating system inside the browser.

name: Beetle
description: Beetle is an extension which allows you to easily grab logins for a website from BugMeNot.
